mapper.select: SELECT DATE_FORMAT(st.start_time, '%Y-%m-%d') AS studyDate, c.name AS categoryName, SUM(st.duration_in_seconds) / 60 AS studyMinutes FROM study_time st JOIN category c ON st.category_id = c.id WHERE st.start_time >= #{startDateTime} GROUP BY studyDate, categoryName ORDER BY studyDate DESC, studyMinutes DESC
